import {React, useState} from 'react' import { Row,Col,Card,Modal,Image,Carousel } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import PostCarousel from './PostCarousel'; function Post({ post }) { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); return (
{post.name} {post.name} { post.image2 ? ( {post.image3 && } ):( )}

{post.description}
) } export default Post
